nml_option.name: config_AM_icePresent_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member icePresent is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_icePresent_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_icePresent_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the icePresent analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_icePresent_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_icePresent_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

package.name: icePresentAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the icePresent analysis member.

var.name: icePresent
var.description: 1.0 if ice present, 0.0 if ice not present
